2.IOS: I'm feeling great! How about you?

3.BROWSER: I'm really glad I have the opportunity to be here!
3.IOS: Have you heard about Cify platform already?

4.IOS: It is a open source test automation framework for mobile and desktop devices.

5.BROWSER: Sounds cool! What are the main features?
5.IOS: First of all, devices can communicate with each other, you don't have to build different tests for different platforms anymore!

6.IOS: Actually I'm using it at the moment

7.BROWSER: So with this framework I could automate applications like Uber?
7.IOS: Yes, exactly, you can build automation scripts from driver to customer and automate the whole flow!

8.BROWSER: Where can I learn more about it?
8.IOS: Well, it's open source, you can take a look at https://github.com/fobsolutions but you can always ask for Marko from the booth.

9.BROWSER: Can Marko answer to my questions about the technical implementation as well?
9.IOS: Yes, he knows everything about the framework and would be happy to answer!

10.BROWSER: Thanks, it was nice talking with you!
